channel.title: PLz How i change what npcs say
channel.description: ya how i change what npcs say

item.title: PLz How i change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

if already have the npc spawned on ur server, then remember the id number of the npc (MY EXAMPLE IS GOING TO BE LOUIE FROM LOUI’S LEGS SHOP) Open NPChandler.java and search:

moo

it should look like this:

} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) { AttackPlayer(i); } if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
under it i would add

if (npcs[i].npcType == 542) { // Louie Legs if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I Sell Random Stuff!"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: PLz How i change what npcs say

item.title: PLz How i change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @wtffab wtffab
item.description:
@wtffab wrote:

(May only work with Pimpscape!)
Go to the NPCHandler on your server. K? ;D Now you search for “1152” and when you get to it copy from the { all the way to the other { and paste it with the other npcs. Now just change the npc id from “1152” to whatever the ID of the monster your wanting to talk is. Now go to the quotes (") and it’ll say “SELLING RARES HERE HO!HO!HO!” change that to whatever you want it to say! Compile your server and start playing :eek:

Read full topic
